details:
adjective
- strongly motivated to succeed
= synonyms: compulsive
- having been learned or found or determined especially by investigation
- characterized by great determination
= example: characterized by great determination
- determined or decided upon as by an authority
= example: determined or decided upon as by an authority
= synonyms: set, dictated
- devoting full strength and concentrated attention to
= example: devoting full strength and concentrated attention to
